works.title: INTA Mobile App (Backend)
works.description: INTA Mobile App, order transportation via mobile apps. Driver setup the trip and user can choose the trip by driver and also by their origin and destination.

works.title: INTA App Landing Page
works.description: Inta is a transportation application, located in Manado North Sulawesi Indonesia.

works.title: INTA Admin Panel
works.description: Admin panel of INTA Mobile app, to control transaction, driver registration, withdrawal and broadcast message.

works.title: Sanjaya Group Company Profile
works.description: PT. Sanjaya Thanry Bahtera is a company engaged in employment services that continues to innovate and plays an active role in the success of government programs, especially in the field of manpower.

works.title: ISIDW Type-S
works.description: ISIDW is application of CV. Putmasari pratama (Authorized Dealer of Telkomsel Indonesia). The Customers of putmasari can buy goods with this application 24 hours. This application also using wallet system to deposit their balance.

works.title: HR Application (Arjuna)
works.description: HR Application of CV. Putmasari pratama to monitor employee attendance, approval, recruitment and payroll.

works.title: Customer Service Application
works.description: Application to communicate with customer via Chat, Confirmation of Customer Deposit, Broadcast Promo to Customer and Customer Survey and also bank automation confirmation

works.title: Selbi (Beta)
works.description: Merchandise ecommerce with public figure on it. Public figure sell their Merchandise or preloved item. This platform is to connecting between fans and artist or public figure.
